This file summarizes changes made between Orpheus versions 2.16 and
2.17.  It is of interest primarily to users who have upgraded from a
previous version.


Bugs fixed
---------------------------------------------------------------------

OVCBASE
  - Raising exception in OnPostEdit gives access violation
OVCDBPF
  - Display is incorrect when used in a db control grid
OVCDBTBL
  - Error when TTable not assigned to the datasource
OVCNBK
  - OnDblClick does not get fired
OVCTABLE
  - Raising exception in OnDoneEdit gives access violation
OVCTBPE1/2
  - Stream read error when displaying the row/col editor
OVCTCBEF
  - Memory leak if form closed while editing


Enhancements
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Added support for Delphi 4.0
